column3: std.stdio.write(x) or std.stdio.writeln(x) or std.stdio.writef(format, x) or std.stdio.writefln(format, x)
column4: stderr.write(x) or stderr.writeln(x) or std.stdio.writef(stderr, format, x) or std.stdio.writefln(stderr, format, x)
fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, x) or fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, format, x)

column2: READ(*,format) variable names or READ(INPUT_UNIT,format) variable names[e]
buffer length ACCEPT ( # chars read ) KEY ( char )
let x = read_int () or let str = read_line () or Scanf.scanf format (fun x ... -> ...)
column3: print_int x or print_endline str or Printf.printf format x ...
column4: prerr_int x or prerr_endline str or Printf.eprintf format x ...

column3: printf format x ... or printfn format x ...
column4: eprintf format x ... or eprintfn format x ...
hPrint stderr x or hPutStrLn stderr str
